s.text: I am writing to ask you, as a business leader, to invest in our community by contributing to this partnership through United Way of Central Indiana.
Then, watch as your investment is used to help make central Indiana a better community in which to live, work and prosper.
Then, watch as your investment is used to help make central Indiana a better community in which to live, work and prosper.

In our community, there is a partnership that pulls together every year to meet urgent needs, and helps ensure that central Indiana continues to be a good place to live, work and do business - the partnership between businesses like yours, United Way of Central Indiana, and its family of 82 human service agencies.
United Way agencies are there for everyone--you, your family, your friends, and your employees.
United Way agencies are there for everyone--you, your family, your friends, and your employees.
I am writing to ask you, as a business leader, to invest in our community by contributing to this partnership through United Way of Central Indiana.
AS YOU CAN SEE, INVESTING IN UNITED WAY OF CENTRAL INDIANA MAKES GOOD BUSINESS SENSE.
United Way agencies are there for everyone--you, your family, your friends, and your employees.
United Way agencies are there for everyone--you, your family, your friends, and your employees.
AS YOU CAN SEE, INVESTING IN UNITED WAY OF CENTRAL INDIANA MAKES GOOD BUSINESS SENSE.
When you support United Way, you can be sure your investment is used prudently: 90 cents of every dollar raised go directly to programs and services that help people in need here in central Indiana.
When you support United Way, you can be sure your investment is used prudently: 90 cents of every dollar raised go directly to programs and services that help people in need here in central Indiana.
By investing in the community through this partnership, you can help more than 220,000 people in central Indiana next year.
Please join the thousands of companies that believe that caring for the community's well-being is an important part of doing business here in central Indiana.
Please join the thousands of companies that believe that caring for the community's well-being is an important part of doing business here in central Indiana.
United Way of Central Indiana adds value by doing research and follow-up to make sure that the most important needs are being met in the most efficient way.

In our community, there is a partnership that pulls together every year to meet urgent needs, and helps ensure that central Indiana continues to be a good place to live, work and do business - the partnership between businesses like yours, United Way of Central Indiana, and its family of 82 human service agencies.
United Way of Central Indiana adds value by doing research and follow-up to make sure that the most important needs are being met in the most efficient way.
United Way of Central Indiana adds value by doing research and follow-up to make sure that the most important needs are being met in the most efficient way.
It sponsors a single, efficient annual campaign for the 82 human service agencies that meet a variety of needs here in central Indiana.

In our community, there is a partnership that pulls together every year to meet urgent needs, and helps ensure that central Indiana continues to be a good place to live, work and do business - the partnership between businesses like yours, United Way of Central Indiana, and its family of 82 human service agencies.
United Way agencies can help your employees by providing services that may not be available elsewhere.
How a community pulls together to help those in need defines that community as a good place to live, a good place to raise a family, and a good place to do business.
